title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1627-6.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1627-6.1 - General

State Regulations

Leases provide for termination of lease and tenancy
thereunder by either authority or tenant at the end of any monthly term. Under
normal circumstances, it is required that the party requesting termination
provide the other with at least one month's notice in
writing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1627-6.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
